word: The enmity of Satan will continue, fierce and determined, against the followers of Jesus. Christ has said to His faithful ones, \93They have persecuted Me; they will also persecute you.\94 There can be no enmity between fallen angels and fallen human beings who have practiced the very works and sport of Satan. . . . Evil\97wherever it exists, in rejecting light and truth and departing from the living God\97will always league against the righteous and obedient.\97Manuscript 62, 1886.
